alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 5:55PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMERON...WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN BEAUREGARD AND CALCASIEU PARISHES...JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON...SOUTHEASTERN HARDIN... ORANGE AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CST... At 555 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oretta to 7 miles east of Stowell. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lake Charles, Port Arthur, Sulphur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Lumberton, Vidor, Bridge City, Westlake, West Orange, Vinton, Nome, Evadale, Moss Bluff, Sabine Pass, Johnsons Bayou, and Fields. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 832. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 41. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Upper Jefferson
